name: Promotion Class: Pit Fighter
description:
Role: Melee Defense

This well rounded pugilist excels at both dealing and mitigating damage.

Stat Adjustments:
Movement Control Intensity +21%
Attack Control Intensity +21%

Traits Granted:
Plate Armor Proficiency
Great Axe Mastery
Great Mace Mastery

Enhancements:
Leap: Now heals you when used below 50% health, once every 90 seconds.
Whirling Pain: Now adds a Barrier when used.
Neckbreaker: Now increases your Max Health by 25% and heals you for 35% of Health, and applies a Root to targets.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Pit Fighter promotion class and prevents access to the Alpha Warrior  and Barbarian promotion classes.
